Uses of Interface
fr.upmc.components.interfaces.DataRequiredI.DataI

  • Packages that use DataRequiredI.DataI 
    Package Description
    fr.upmc.components.connectors
    Hierarchy of connector objects to assemble components.
    fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.filter
    Component and port for sensor simulators The package fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.filter provides a filtering component that behaves as a sensor so that sensor clients need not know whether they are connected to sensors or filters.
    fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.rng
    Interfaces for random number generation services The package fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.rng/code> defines two kinds of random number generation components.
    fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.rng.interfaces
    Interfaces for random number generation services The package fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.rng.interfaces provides interfaces for random number generation components.
    fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.rng.ports
    Ports for random number generation services The package fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.rng.ports provides ports for random number generation components.
    fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.sensor
    Component and port for sensor simulators The package fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.sensor provides a sensor simulator component and its port used to offer its service.
    fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.sensor.interfaces
    Interfaces and data for sensor services The package fr.upmc.components.examples.smoothing.sensor.interfaces provides two interfaces for sensor services, a data offered interface SensorDataOfferedI for the sensor service providers and SensorDataRequiredI for the sensor service clients.
    fr.upmc.components.interfaces
    Types of offered and required interfaces for components.
    fr.upmc.components.ports
    Hierarchy of ports to expose interfaces of components and interconnect them.

    • Uses of DataRequiredI.DataI in fr.upmc.components.connectors

      Methods in fr.upmc.components.connectors that return DataRequiredI.DataI 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DataRequiredI.DataI DataConnectorI.offered2required(DataOfferedI.DataI d)
      translate data as defined by the offered interface into data as defined in the required interface.
      DataRequiredI.DataI AbstractDataConnector.offered2required(DataOfferedI.DataI d) 
      DataRequiredI.DataI DataConnector.request()
      pass the request for a new datum from the requiring component to the offering component.
      DataRequiredI.DataI ActiveDataConnector.request()
      implements the required pull interface by taking a value from the data buffer if any, blocking if none.
      Methods in fr.upmc.components.connectors with parameters of type DataRequiredI.DataI 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DataOfferedI.DataI DataConnectorI.required2offered(DataRequiredI.DataI d)
      translate data as defined by the required interface into data as defined in the offered interface.
      DataOfferedI.DataI AbstractDataConnector.required2offered(DataRequiredI.DataI d)

    • Uses of DataRequiredI.DataI in fr.upmc.components.interfaces

      Methods in fr.upmc.components.interfaces that return DataRequiredI.DataI 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DataRequiredI.DataI DataRequiredI.PullI.request()
      the method request is called by the requiring component to trigger the obtaining of a piece of data from the offering one.
      Methods in fr.upmc.components.interfaces with parameters of type DataRequiredI.DataI 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void DataRequiredI.PushI.receive(DataRequiredI.DataI d)
      the method receive is called from the offering component side to make the requiring side receiving a piece of data.

    • Uses of DataRequiredI.DataI in fr.upmc.components.ports

      Methods in fr.upmc.components.ports that return DataRequiredI.DataI 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DataRequiredI.DataI AbstractDataOutboundPort.request()
      called by the requiring component in pull mode to trigger the obtaining of a piece of data from the offering one; this definition imposes the synchronized nature of the method, as it is called by the owner to get data from server components.
